violations.description: Attempted implementation phase before completing prerequisite phases: ['planning', 'architecture', 'analysis']
remediation_actions: Launch RIF-Analyst to complete requirements analysis
Launch RIF-Planner to create execution plan
Launch RIF-Architect to complete technical design
Wait for prerequisite phases to complete before launching implementation agents
Use sequential agent launching instead of parallel launching

violations.description: Attempting implementation on dependent issues while foundation issues [4] are incomplete
remediation_actions: Wait for foundation APIs/frameworks to be ready
Launch foundation agents first, dependent agents second

warnings: Issue #5: Jumping to implementation without architecture phase
Issue #5: Weak evidence of phase completion
